Jobs.title: Senior Software Developer
Jobs.description: ', 'TAL Direct is the leading direct insurance provider in Australia. It operates the InsuranceLine brand and numerous "white label" alliances producing life insurance products and services for businesses such as Virgin Money, NIB and IAG.', '', 'As a senior developer, my role includes software design, implementation and support for insurance products on the in-house sales and admin system, and the customer-facing website. Software is developed in an Agile environment using TDD.', '', 'The technologies utilised include C#, VB.NET, ASP.NET, SQL Server 2008, T-SQL, MSMQ, WCF, RESTful web services, Linq2SQL, DevExpress, NUnit, Rhinomocks, Specflow, Project White, CruiseControl and TeamCity.', '

Jobs.company: Department of Employment, Economic Development and Innovation
Jobs.title: .NET Consultant
Jobs.description: ', 'Short-term contract to implement a system for classifying and tracking scientific samples, with a tight deadline and a rapidly assembled team of 3 consultants. We utilised the Scrum Agile methodology to implement the most important system components first, empowering us to deliver a working product within 4 weeks.', '', 'My role involved business analysis, story breakdown, system architecture and software development. We built the system using C#, ASP.NET, SQL Server 2008, WCF, Linq2SQL and NUnit for TDD.', '

Jobs.title: Strategic Developer
Jobs.description: ', 'BNP Paribas is one of the largest banks in the world, measured by total assets. As a strategic developer my role involved system architecture, business analysis, development and support for a range of Product Control and Financial Control / Middle Office applications.', '', 'The overall system consisted of a number of SQL Server 2000 & 2008 databases, C# WPF GUI, MQ feed, and legacy MSAccess databases.', '

Jobs.title: Senior Systems Developer
Jobs.description: ', 'PAI is a fund of hedge funds and one of the leading companies in the alternative investments arena. Momentus is PAI’s front office system, providing functionality for research and quantitative analysis, portfolio construction, investment management and reporting.', '', 'As a senior developer on the Momentus team and as one of a team of four, I was responsible for business analysis, system architecture, development and support. The system consisted of C# MVP Winforms and C# ASP.NET front ends, C# .NET remoting mid-tier, SQL Server 2000 database, Sharepoint 2003 and Reporting Services 2000.', '

Jobs.title: Analyst Developer
Jobs.description: ', 'Osiris is a pricing, booking and risk management system for exotic interest rate derivatives. The system incorporates extensive use of distributed components and parallel processing, using a DataSynapse GridServer for complex pricing and risk sensitivity calculations and simulations.', '', 'As a senior developer on the Osiris team, I was responsible for reengineering the overnight pricing and risk system, migrating overnight risk reports to the GridServer framework and implementing a large number of features, bug fixes and utilities.', '

Jobs.title: IT Systems Development Engineer
Jobs.description: ', 'Project Jupiter was the first project in the world to fully digitalise the newsroom environment. The system utilises a digital core of media servers to produce a tape-less production environment. This empowers editors and journalists to access, distribute and archive media from their desktop ingestion from satellite feed or tape.', '', 'As a core developer on the team I was involved at all stages of the project lifecycle, from requirement specification and design through to implementation, testing, bug fixing and performance improvements.', '

Jobs.title: Lead Applications Developer
Jobs.description: ', 'As a senior developer working in this rapidly growing telecommunications company (winner of the Deloitte and Touche Fast50 Award as one of the fastest growing companies in the UK and in the top 100 in Europe) I successfully developed critical applications that are currently in use throughout the world.', '

summary: ', 'A pragmatic, creative and team-oriented software engineer with an excellent attitude and communication skills, backed up by extensive development experience and solid academic qualifications.', '
